name: TheProjectDice
0:
”Alexa ask project dice to roll”
”Alexa ask project dice to drop”
”Alexa play project dice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: project dice
des:
Rolls three dices that contain an bad outcome from your recent project, reasons for that outcome and a solution you can employ to mitigate.

This could be a handy tool, if you are stuck trying to explain why your project is not going well.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
